thread.title: Harward Turns Down Trump National Security Adviser Job
thread.title_full: Harward Turns Down Trump National Security Adviser Job

author: AP
title: Harward Turns Down Trump National Security Adviser Job
text: FILE PHOTO: Vice Adm. Robert S. Harward, commanding officer of Combined Joint Interagency Task Force 435, speaks to an Afghan official during his visit to Zaranj, Afghanistan, in this January 6, 2011 handout photo. The visit consisted of a tour of a provincial prison, the Iran/Afghanistan border crossing and an airfield assessment. Sgt. Shawn Coolman/U.S. Marines/Handout via REUTERS
